LanguageData.VPE_Apparel_EltexMask.label: eltex mask
LanguageData.VPE_Apparel_EltexMask.description: An artistically impressive mask emanating psychic energy. Hides the face of the wearer but provides little physical protection. Its special materials enhance the wearer's psychic sensitivity and dissipate neural heat.
LanguageData.VPE_Apparel_EltexCape.label: eltex cape
LanguageData.VPE_Apparel_EltexCape.description: A long cape of mystical design. It hangs over one side of the torso. Its special materials enhance the wearer's psychic sensitivity and dissipate neural heat.
